alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 2:17PM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 11 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...North Cass, South Itasca, South Cass, Crow Wing, Northern Aitkin, South Aitkin and Pine Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake, Lena Lake, Hinckley and, Big Sandy Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS..A brief lull in snowfall intensity occurs this afternoon and evening. Expect heavy snow to redevelop Wednesday night into Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca
